mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 73; "Curious Case" and "Practical Prints"; First handwritten note describes a woman's attack and how fingerprints solved the case. The second handwritten note briefly describes aspect of finger patterns.; 2 leaves; DF 871
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
